subject.normal: [WikiEN-l] To: Jimmy Wales - Admin-driven death of Wikipedia

headers.subject: [WikiEN-l] To: Jimmy Wales - Admin-driven death of Wikipedia

body.para: On 6 Jun 2006 at 15:38, Raphael Wegmann <raphael at psi.co.at> wrote:

quote.quotepara: The discussion is not about thoughtcrimes. It is about hate *speech* which is a different matter. The U.S. is actually violating an UN resoltion by not passing hate speech laws.

body.footer: -- == Dan == Dan's Mail Format Site: http://mailformat.dan.info/ Dan's Web Tips: http://webtips.dan.info/ Dan's Domain Site: http://domains.dan.info/
